x011/smtp-tunnel-proxy

Disguises TCP traffic as SMTP communication to bypass firewalls

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • SMTP relay focused on observability
  • Proxy server for transactional emails via Cloudflare Workers
  • TCP tunneling over CDN for firewall bypass
  • SOCKS proxy that rotates your source IP using SSH tunnels or subnets
  • turns TCP traffic into HTTP using Netfilter Queue
  • Tunnels TCP connections through a file system
  • Redirects TCP connections for any program
  • Disguises proxy traffic as web browsing
  • Exposes local servers to the internet via public URLs
  • Exposes local HTTP and WebSocket services to the internet
